Grimlock felt his once brutish, but child like past self coming through... he 
with his new intelligence was trying to decide wether to shake his old 
friends hand and tell him everything he needed to know, or Hug him and ask for all 
his new stories...

--part1_a2.38115db3.2c16ca75_boundary
